Urethritis or cervicitis: treatment of probabilistic gonococcal and chlamydial infection

- Ceftriaxone single dose IM or IV 1000 mg

- Doxycycline 200 mg PO 7 days (or azithromycin 1g single dose)

question.question: What is the recommended treatment for probabilistic gonococcal and chlamydial infection in cases of urethritis or cervicitis?
question.option_a: A single dose of Ceftriaxone 500 mg IM or IV and Doxycycline 200 mg PO for 7 days
question.option_b: A single dose of Ceftriaxone 1000 mg IM or IV and Azithromycin 1g single dose
question.option_c: A single dose of Ceftriaxone 1000 mg IM or IV and Doxycycline 200 mg PO for 7 days
question.option_d: A single dose of Azithromycin 1g and Doxycycline 200 mg PO for 14 days
